lead_paragraph: LEAD: A Federal judge extended his temporary order blocking the purchase of the Lucky Stores Inc. supermarket chain by the American Stores Company, which owns the Alpha Beta grocery chain. Federal District Judge David Kenyon said he needed more time to consider the merits of a challenge to the merger by California's Attorney General, John Van de Kamp.
